page.title: 06A day in the life of Lindsey
page.content: On a school day Iget up at 7o'clock.I get dressed,then do my teeth.Igo down stairs to have my toast.Ihave melted butter and chocolate spread.We have just moved from Doncaster and I keep forgetting to put the plates out.My Dad moved jobs.He used to work for Inter- national Harvesters.He now works at the Blackwood Hodge Management Centre in Northampton. When Mummy gets up,she gets dressed and wakes me up.She gets breakfast ready.When Daddy gets up,he has a bath, shaves,dresses,goes downstairs,and leaves. When my sister(Katy)wakes up,I don't know what she does,because she is at a boarding school in York. My mummy isn't working at the moment. She used to work as a physio-therapist in Pontefract.
